programme.title: Thanksgiving 1998
programme.short_synopsis: The history and traditions of Thanksgiving and the opposition to the celebration in 1998.
programme.medium_synopsis: From New York to Sarajevo, Alistair Cooke considers the history and traditions of Thanksgiving celebrations, recent opposition and Churchill's first meeting with a turkey dinner.

programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
